```shell
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# 1. Gather all buttPlay.json files under src/locales
files=$(fd 'buttPlay\.json$' src/locales)

# 2. Use the first file as the reference
first_file=$(echo "$files" | head -n1)
echo "Using reference: $first_file"

# 3. Extract and sort its action-group keys
ref_keys=$(jq -r '.actions | keys[]' "$first_file" | sort)

# 4. Compare every other file against the reference
mismatch=0
while IFS= read -r file; do
  echo "Checking: $file"
  curr_keys=$(jq -r '.actions | keys[]' "$file" | sort)
  if ! diff -u <(echo "$ref_keys") <(echo "$curr_keys"); then
    echo "⚠️  Key mismatch detected in $file"
    mismatch=1
  fi
done <<< "$files"

# 5. Final result
if [ $mismatch -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "✅ All buttPlay.json locales have identical action-group keys."
  exit 0
else
  echo "❌ Parity checks failed – please align your keys."
  exit 1
fi
```
